PresentationColumn.name: # of Loyalty Responses
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric counts the number of responsese from campaigns with a type of loyalty. (if campaign.type = loyalty then 1)

PresentationColumn.name: # of Participants (Actual)
PresentationColumn.Description: this metric counts the number of people who participated in events. (IF event supporter status = 'Attended', 'Confirmed', 'Confirmed - Paid', 'Confirmed - To Pay', 'Entered' then contact_wid)

PresentationColumn.name: # Responses
PresentationColumn.Description: Total # of Responses. Works at the Program Plan, Program, Stage , Campaign plan and Campaign level

PresentationColumn.name: Expenditure (Actual)
PresentationColumn.Description: Actual Marketing Cost

PresentationColumn.name: Response Rate
PresentationColumn.Description: Response Rate is calculated by Number of Responders against No of Supporters Passed in External Cleansing

PresentationColumn.name: # Cross Sold to
PresentationColumn.Description: # of Supporters targeted in a Campaign (If campaign.primary purpose = 'Cash Cross-Sell', 'CoG Cross-Sell', 'Cross-sell' then contact_wid)

PresentationColumn.name: # Loaded
PresentationColumn.Description: Total # of people loaded in a Campaign

PresentationColumn.name: # of Loyalty Contacts
PresentationColumn.Description: # of supporters in a loyalty campaign (if campaign.type = loyalty then 1)

PresentationColumn.name: # of Responses Loaded
PresentationColumn.Description: # of Responses Loaded as calculated in the warehouse as opposed to manually entering in Siebel

PresentationColumn.name: # Targeted
PresentationColumn.Description: The above measures calculates the unique number of contacts or accounts that were in a launched campaign. This does not necessarily mean that they were contacted. The information is latest as of the time it was loaded in the Siebel RMW.

PresentationColumn.name: 12 month COG ROI %
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the ROI of a campaign based on an estimated 12 month COG value (100* 12 month COG value / Marketing Costs)

PresentationColumn.name: 12 month COG ROI % With GiftAid
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the ROI of a campaign based on an estimated 12 month COG value with gift aid (IF Giftaid = 'Y' then 12 month COG value * 1+(Gift Aid) ELSE 12 month COG value)

PresentationColumn.name: 5 Year COG ROI %
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the ROI of a campaign based on an estimated 5 year COG value (100* 5 Year COG value / Marketing Costs)

PresentationColumn.name: 5 Year COG ROI % with GiftAid
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the ROI % of COG campaigns based on a modelled 5 year future value including Gift Aid. This metric is used to more accuraretly predict the inital cost ratio of a COG campaign rather than using individual donations. (100*(if Gift aid = Y then 5 Year COG value * (1+gift Aid) else 5 Year COG value) / Marketing Costs

PresentationColumn.name: 5 Year Cost Ratio with GiftAid
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the cost ratio of COG campaigns based on a modelled 5 year future value with gift aid. This metric is used to more accuraretly predict the inital cost ratio of a COG campaign rather than using individual donations. ( Marketing Costs / (if Gift aid = Y then 5 Year COG value * (1+gift Aid) else 5 Year COG value)

PresentationColumn.name: Average Donation (No Gift Aid)
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the average donation excluding the tax amount (donation.amount)

PresentationColumn.name: Income (calculated)
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the sum of individual donations (donation.amount)

PresentationColumn.name: ROI %
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the ROI of a campaign based on donations received (100* donation.amount / Marketing Costs)

PresentationColumn.name: ROI Amount
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the ROI amount of a campaign based on donations received (donation.amount - Marketing Costs)

PresentationColumn.name: # Cross-Sold
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the number of donations that were created as a result of an cross-sell campaign (If campaign.primary purpose = 'Cash Cross-Sell', 'CoG Cross-Sell', 'Cross-sell' then 1)

PresentationColumn.name: # Up-Sold
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the number of donations that were created as a result of an up-sell campaign (If campaign.primary purpose = 'Up-sell' then 1)

PresentationColumn.name: 12 Month Average COG with GiftAid
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the average of the estimated monthly equivalant COG values including the gift aid calculation (12 month COG * (1+gift aid)

PresentationColumn.name: 12 Month COG Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates and sums estimated COG income for the next 12 months based on the frequency and frequency amount. (IF order.type = 'Any Covenanted Payment', 'Direct Debit', 'Standing Order' then 12 month value)

PresentationColumn.name: 12 Month COG Revenue with GiftAid
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the average of the estimated 12 month COG values including Gift Aid. (12 month COG * (1+gift aid)

PresentationColumn.name: Average Transaction Value (No Gift Aid)
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the average donation value without gift aid

PresentationColumn.name: Gift Aid Amount (Calculated)
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the amount of gift aid associated with donations (donation.gift aid amount)

PresentationColumn.name: Up-Sold %
PresentationColumn.Description: this metric calculates the number of up sold donations vs the number of people targeted in a campaign (# up-sold / # of supporters)

PresentationColumn.name: Cost/Income Ratio inc. Potential Gift Aid Amount
PresentationColumn.Description: This is the ratio of the Cost of a campaign vs. the income, including Potential Gift Aid regardless of whether it has been claimed.
